Home.description: Smart and technological solutions for you and your business.

About.businessTitle: Need a technological upgrade for your business ?
About.businessDescription: If your business needs a website, a web system, or even an application, let us take care of it.
About.forYouTitle: Have an innovative idea to bring to life ?
About.forYouSubtitle: Don't let your ideas stay on paper
About.forYouDescription: Our team is ready to create an innovative technological solution with you. Who knows, maybe you're the next Bill Gates?

Services.title: OUR SERVICES
Services.subtitle: How can we help you?
Services.websiteDescription: We create a tailor-made website to meet your demands, with comprehensive planning that includes everything from layout design to system implementation.
Services.webAppDescription: We customize systems according to your specific needs to enhance the management of data stored in your company, aiming for more efficient and effective administration.
Services.mobileAppDescription: Torabox will materialize your ideas through the development of an app, turning your ideas into functional and accessible solutions.
Services.designDescription: Thinking about having a website but don't know where to start? It all begins with interface design, where we conduct personalized studies and prototypes to ensure that your site meets its objectives.

Portfolio.title: PORTFOLIO
Portfolio.subtitle: Check out some of our projects
Portfolio.secondProjectDescription: App with a collection of stories and relaxing music to help children sleep
Portfolio.fourthProjectDescription: Mobile App focused on autistic children
